features: One refill box of 30 bags for clean, easy, discreet disposal of tampons, pads, pantyliners, wipes, feminine hygiene products, disposable menstrual cups or discs. Compatible with Scensibles compact wall-mounted restroom dispenser. Bags are interleave folded for easy dispensing of one bag at a time.
Personal Disposal bags offer a more hygienic alternative to brown Kraft paper bags and wrapping products in wads of toilet paper.
Stop unnecessary flushing of tampons, sanitary pads, wipes and other hygiene products! Effective way to protect septic tanks, toilets, and sewer lines from expensive clogs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Universal Feminine Hygiene Bag Dispensers and Refills by Hygolet The Universal Feminine Hygiene Bag Dispenser provides a safe, discreet, and hygienic way for women to dispose of sanitary products in public restrooms. Our product reduces plumbing costs from improper disposal of feminine products that can clog toilets. Each refill cartridge provides 30 bags using our easy feed z-fold system. Easy to install on any surface. Hygolet represents quality, innovation, and reliability in the field of public washroom hygiene. We strive to promote cleanliness and hygiene in washrooms with practical, high-quality products. Our vision is to support companies and public institutions by providing their toilet users with a hygienic and comfortable washroom experience.

Universal Feminine Hygiene Bag Dispensers and Refills by Hygolet The Universal Feminine Hygiene Bag Dispenser provides a safe, discreet, and hygienic way for women to dispose of sanitary products in public restrooms. Our product reduces plumbing costs from improper disposal of feminine products that can clog toilets. Each refill cartridge provides 30 bags using our easy feed z-fold system. Easy to install on any surface. Hygolet represents quality, innovation, and reliability in the field of public washroom hygiene. We strive to promote cleanliness and hygiene in washrooms with practical, high-quality products. Our vision is to support companies and public institutions by providing their toilet users with a hygienic and comfortable washroom experience.
Feminine Hygiene Bag Dispenser Feminine Hygiene Bag Dispense Feminine Hygiene Bag Dispense 60 Pack- Refills One Refill Classic White Midnight Black Deluxe Chrome Case of 60 Refills One Refill

Technical Specifications Brand Hygolet Dimensions 3.94 x 1.1 x 5.51 Inches Material Made of robust ABS plastic Includes Includes Refill Bag, Installation Kit Universal Univeral use in Feminine hygiene dispensers also from other suppliers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great when you're on the go
reviews.reviewText: Many of us have been in difficult situations where you have no place to throw away your mensural items because the restroom you're using didn't restock them. These bags will save the day and allow you to dispose of them safely, easily, and discreetly. I took them out of the box, so the bags fit in my fanny pack perfectly right now. You can also keep these in the car as garbage bags when you're in a pinch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small, thin but do the job
reviews.reviewText: I don’t like to use excess plastic but these are nice to help contain feminine hygiene products that should not go in the toilet. The bags are thin and small but fit most standard products - I do wish they were a darker color since they are a little transparent. I don’t have a holder for these so I’ll likely look into getting one for our guest bathrooms but I just keep the box in a little basket above the toilet for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Universal Feminine Disposal Bags for Menstrual Care Products 4 Pack
reviews.reviewText: Having these on hand makes me feel better about disposing of my tampons in public restrooms. I also use it at home and it leaves my trash can looking less bloody you could say lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good for pads
reviews.reviewText: so I placed this in my bathroom for feminine products and these bag sizes are good and locks in the smell pretty well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to replace
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to replace once it runs out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Handy, if a bit small
reviews.reviewText: These sanitary disposal bags come in a handy, pop-up box. They are relatively sturdy and a nice alternative to wrapping everything in miles of toilet paper. I have only 2 suggestions: 1, the bag should be a bit larger. It will be a struggle to stuff larger sanitary napkins into this. 2, I wish the bag were more opaque. There is no way to discretely dispose of a used tampon in this without being able to see exactly what it is, without having to first wrap it in toilet paper, which defeats the purpose. If you don't care what can be seen in your trash, then it doesn't matter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wish they were a darker color
reviews.reviewText: These are great bags and serve its purpose, I just wish they were a darker color. You can see whatever you put in there easily because, would have been nice if they weren’t so sheer or a darker color altogether.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy For Women
reviews.reviewText: These little translucent plastic feminine care disposal bags are really handy. They come in a small box, perfect to fit in a purse, and they do not rattle or crinkle like crazy when using them, I like that they are translucent so you can dispose of your feminine care items discretely. They do not have adhesion to them, which would be an improvement, but nonetheless, fold the edge over and toss it into the trash.
